thread.title: Excellent Boutique Hotel -
thread.title_full: Excellent Boutique Hotel - Review of Hotel Eiffel Seine, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: puneet_pg
title: Excellent Boutique Hotel -
text:
Hotel Eiffel Seine is a very cosy boutique hotel in the heart of the city. Walking distance from Eiffel Tower.
Hospitality is simply marvellous. Very kind and helpful staff, always more than ready to help you in best possible manner. Other than its own services, the hotel also offers various sightseeing tours and helps customers with best of the options to reach various tourist spots with tour or by self.
Restaurant in the basement is very cosy and offers wonderful breakfast to start your day.
